ai-ja418:1.1_0: “In the past, they say, is a “gitation”;
ai-ja418:1.3_0: Questioning in Bāhiya of the Robe
ai-ja418:1.4_0: have passed away to the ghost realm.
ai-ja418:1.5_0: in the midst of the Sangha.
ai-ja418:1.6_0: I have no peace of mind.
ai-ja418:2.3_0: Who are my children and partners?
ai-ja418:3.1_0: “For the complete ending of all defilements,
ai-ja418:3.4_0: like a drum on the bank.”
ai-ja418:4.2_0: the King’s home, and his daughter,
ai-ja418:5.1_0: “Having gone (there) I can’t go from here.
ai-ja418:5.2_0: I’m freed from the King’s home,
ai-ja418:5.3_0: I’ll make prickles out of water,
ai-ja418:5.4_0: should worship the victor in front of me.”
ai-ja418:7.4_0: don’t let the Yasa lift his head.”
ai-ja418:8.1_0: “This one who sees the utter ending of rebirth,
ai-ja418:8.2_0: or death will not come again.
ai-ja418:8.3_0: This is the last month of the room.
ai-ja418:8.4_0: for me to have no future lives.”
ai-ja418:9.1_0: The second group of eight is finished.
